function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of microfluidic cartridges and PCR-based systems for rapid testing","Impact":"Potential for false negative results leading to undetected spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict quality control measures and validation protocols","Technologies":"Quality control protocols, validation systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, testing laboratories"},{"Description":"Approval and widespread use of various POCT systems","Impact":"Risk of improper use or misinterpretation of test results","Mitigation":"Comprehensive training for healthcare professionals, clear guidelines for test interpretation","Technologies":"Training programs, educational materials","People":"Healthcare professionals, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Application of technology without professional skills","Impact":"Increased risk of erroneous testing and misdiagnosis","Mitigation":"Promote awareness of the limitations of the technology, encourage professional consultation","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns, professional consultation services","People":"General public, untrained personnel","Owner":"Public health organizations, healthcare professionals"}]}
